id: Pacers add more depth to bench, recall Anigbogu from Fort Wayne
paragraph:
The Indiana Pacers announced Saturday they have recalled center Ike Anigbogu from their NBA G League affiliate, the Fort Wayne Mad Ants.
Anigbogu played in four games with Fort Wayne, averaging 10.5 points per game with 10 rebounds. He has played in one game for the Pacers this season, coming off the bench for one game against the Brooklyn Nets on October 20.
